content: introducing the **twinkle crochet tank top** an original and enchanting design by shylercrochets this exquisite tank top features a stunning arrangement of motifs that come together to create a beautiful breathable and lacy masterpiece perfect for any occasion when worked in cotton yarn it provides a cool and comfortable fit ideal for warm weather whether you re dressing up for a casual day out or adding a unique piece to your summer collection the twinkle crochet tank top is sure to impress the twinkle crochet tank top can be customized to any length offering versatility and style in one unique piece inspired by the beloved viva tank top http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/viva-tank-top this design elevates the concept with intricate details and an airy feel making it a must-have for your crochet collection whether you re dressing up for a special event or looking for a chic casual look this tank top will be your go-to choice if you do not have paypal purchase on my website https //shylercrochets com/product/twinkle-crochet-tank-top/ this listing is for a pdf file not for physical product by purchasing this digital pattern you acknowledge that you have read this disclaimer and that you will receive a digital file refunds will not be accepted pattern information sizes made to measure terminology us skill level intermediate / advanced materials hook 3 5mm scissors measuring tape yarn color fluid from performance yarns approximately 3 balls | 130m each ball darning needle purchase yarn here performanceyarn com discount code shyler10 to follow with a video tutorial https //youtu be/8wsdzs6lfjc thank you for supporting this pattern please tag me @shylercrochets on instagram so i can see your finished makes feel free to contact me anytime incase of any questions regarding this pattern at shylercrochets@gmail com
